mapper.select:
select * from eforces_users where isdelete=0
and name=#{name} or incname=#{incname} or departname=#{departname}
select id AS value, name AS title from eforces_user where departname=#{departname}
select * from eforces_user where Number = #{Number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isdelete = 0
mapper.sql: Id, Number, Password, Name, Incnumber, Incname, Incid, Departid, departname, Mobile, Tel, Businesshall, Businesshallname, Address, Recipient, RecipientCode, Departadmin, Departadminname, Creattime, lastip, lasttime, loginnumber, type, method,portraitPath, identityFontpath,identityBackPath,isdelete
mapper.select: select a.*,group_concat(b.groupid) as groupid from eforces_user a left join eforces_usersgrouprele b on a.id = b.userid where a.Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from eforces_user where isdelete = 0
and Name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and incname like CONCAT('%',#{incname},'%')
and departname like CONCAT('%',#{departname},'%')
SELECT max(Number) as Number from eforces_user where incnumber = #{incNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and Number is not null and isdelete = 0

select
from eforces_user where Mobile = #{Mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isdelete = 0
mapper.update:
update eforces_user set isdelete = 1 where id in
#{id}
